title: Mine Site Safety Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental industrial safety knowledge and general understanding of mining work environments
context.additional_context: Training focused on acquiring risk response and safety procedures in a virtual environment simulating an actual mining site

learning_goals: Perform safety equipment wearing procedures in virtual mine sites accurately within three steps
Execute appropriate initial responses within 10 seconds during simulated emergencies (fires/collapses)
Achieve over 90% compliance with on-site safety communication protocols through VR-based team missions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
